name: Cruise Control (itch)
description:
Made during the Omaha UNO's  IGH 2019 game jam with a team of 4 people.

You drive around using WASD and try and find a big gold star to progress to the next level.

Q and E will change your car's speed, but it will also increase how much pollusion you add. Higher pollusion will make the next level harder.

Try and make it though as many levels as possible!
